name: Lingering Flames
prereq: Spell Trickster Dedication; Ability To Cast Fireball
summary: When you cast fireball, you can modify its effects to set creatures in its area aflame.
description:
When you cast fireball, you can modify its effects, decreasing the base damage to 5d6 and causing it to deal 2 persistent fire damage to creatures that fail their save, doubled as normal on a critical failure. If you do, replace its heightened entry with the following.

 Heightened (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6 and the persistent fire damage is increased by 2.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
